response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds immense value to us, but its worth to you is even greater. I understand its significance and importance to you, which is why I am extending this offer with utmost sincerity.

We are offering the product to you at a special price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value of $1,000,000, providing you with an exceptional deal that we believe will be beneficial for both parties.

Please consider this offer carefully. If you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We are here to assist you throughout the process.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
